page.title: 19TVEI - WORK EXPERIENCE
page.content: My school, Tong Upper is one of the few schools which is pioneering the Technical and Vocational Education Initiative scheme. Places are only available for l50 pupils in any one school year and are limited to the fourth and fifth forms. In the fourth year we spend two separate weeks in the Work Experience Unit. My form spent its first week there after Christmas.We were divided into five groups and we changed jobs each day. One day we worked in the canteen and made morning coffee and baked the biscuits which we sold to pupils and staff. We also prepared the lunch for the whole form and some staff.In the afternoon after washing up we made some sweets. I spent a day in the stores checking stock, another day in reception and a day in reprographics. I enjoyed all the work.
